code: import axios from"axios";import authHeader from'../service/auth-header';var userRegion=localStorage.getItem("userRegion");var headers=authHeader();if(userRegion){userRegion=userRegion.replace(/ /g,"_");}var API_URL_REPORT="/api/v1/reports?region="+userRegion;var API_URL_FETCH_REPORT_BY_PLAYER="/api/v1/reports/players/";var API_URL_FETCH_LAST_REPORT_OF_REGION="/api/v1/reports/last?region="+userRegion;var fetchReportByPlayerUsername=function fetchReportByPlayerUsername(username){return axios.get(API_URL_FETCH_REPORT_BY_PLAYER+username+'?region='+userRegion);};var fetchLastReportOfRegion=function fetchLastReportOfRegion(){return axios.get(API_URL_FETCH_LAST_REPORT_OF_REGION).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var doReport=function doReport(nickname,reportType,description){return axios.post(API_URL_REPORT,{nickname:nickname,reportType:reportType,description:description},headers).then(function(response){return response;});};export default{fetchReportByPlayerUsername:fetchReportByPlayerUsername,doReport:doReport,fetchLastReportOfRegion:fetchLastReportOfRegion};
